attributes.action: Make the House of Commons debate votes for 16 & 17 year olds, not just votes for prisoners.
attributes.additional_details: It is not right that the Government should decide to give the right to vote to 16 & 17 year olds in the referendum in Scotland without a debate in the House of Commons.  It is an affront to democracy that the Government should not call for a debate in the House of commons on whether to give the vote to 16 & 17 year olds.
